On Escalation Ticket # 00413618 the new comment has been added: Cristian-Alexandru Halmajan:

Hi @Emil-Ionut Podar,

Could you please confirm the following: 

	 - 	what is the server version,
	 - 	how environment is hosted (on-prem/AWS/GCP/AZURE/Our hosted) 
	 - 	how patch were applied
	 - 	which version of Clients were used to reproduced
	 - 	if Clients were rebooted after the install 
	 - 	how it behave before patch (logs should be attached if possible)
	 - 	necessary logs should be collected
	 - 	any other detail describing issue need to be included.

Thank you,
Cristi

[DevOps CommentId:10515766]

On Escalation Ticket # 00413618 the new comment has been added: Cristian-Alexandru Halmajan:

Hi @Emil-Ionut Podar,

I hope you are well.

The issue has been tracked under https://dev.azure.com/NetwrixCorporation/CoSoSys-EPP/_workitems/edit/345259.
Currently, there is a fix in place which is already available, and also, back end procedure #62 from this Google Doc, explains how this fix can be manually applied.

I hope this helps.

Please let me know if I can further assist.

Regards,
Cristi
